bounties.title: Split Mudlet up into `libmudlet` and a Qt front-end
generic mapper: add video walkthrough on how to set it up
Implement sentry.io's Qt SDK for crash reporting
Support telnet:// links
Undo/redo support in editor
Autocomplete steals window focus, prevents further typing
